page.title: 18CHANGES IN FECKENHAM 2
page.content: We had a lady to visit us who was born in the village over 70 years ago. She said that there used to be 7 shops in the village. My house used to be a sweet shop.There was also a greengrocers and a bakery. To keep themselves occupied they went on long walks. They also played hopscotch, hoops, and tops. You had to hit the top with a stick and a whip to keep it rolling along the road. The vicarage used to be part of the old needle industry. The first person in the village to have a car was the doctor. Before that he had a motorcycle and sidecar. At Christmas they had fruit in their stockings, they didn't have many toys at all. The books for children only had black and white pictures and they were usually Fairy Stories.
